organizations: National Assn of Stock Car Auto Racing
lead_paragraph: Dodge said it would use its Charger model next season in Nascar, scrapping plans to field the Avenger it used in Car of Tomorrow races this year. Dodge used both models this past season.
snippet: Dodge said it would use its Charger model next season in Nascar, scrapping plans to field the Avenger it used in Car of Tomorrow races this year. Dodge used both models this past season.
